cause.description:
Children's Association for Maximum Potential (CAMP) provides a Summer Camp with a series of five-day sessions for children and adults with special needs (age 5-22 and adults up to the age of 45) who may not be eligible to attend other camps due to the severity of their disability or medical condition. We also include activities for campers' siblings without disabilities. CAMP also have programs year round to include Weekend CAMP, Parent's Night Out (PNO) and Teen and Adult Day Adventure (TADA)
1. To stregthen and inspire individuals with special needs through recreation, respite and education.
2. Provide a fun and safe place for individuals with special needs while giving care givers respite.
cause.mission: CAMP's mission is to strengthen and inspire individuals with special needs - and those who care for them - through Recreation, Respite, and Education.
cause.name: Camp CAMP
